leve.name: Kill the Messenger
leve.description: The unbeliever Armantel Scaletalker is our problem now, for the Holy See cannot be seen to slay him─he was a dragoon of Ishgard not so long ago. They say he loves the dragons and makes war on Mor Dhona. Traders swear he is a slave to potions of sleep. Others murmur he saw much in the inquisition chamber─and now makes war on the Holy See.
